#text=I wanted to bake a cake for my husband for his birthday , but I was not sure how to do it .
#text=I decided to go to the store and buy a box of cake mix .
#text=The box said that I would need oil and eggs to make the cake , so I bought those items , too .
#text=When I got home , I followed the instructions listed on the box .
#text=I preheated my oven to 350 degrees and sprayed a baking pan with cooking spray .
#text=I mixed together the cake mix , oil and eggs .
#text=Once it was mixed really well , I poured the cake batter into a pan .
#text=I put the pan into the oven and set a timer .
#text=When the timer went off , I took my cake out of the oven .
#text=After it cooled off , I put vanilla frosting on the cake .
#text=My husband enjoyed his cake very much .
